name: Swing Thing (dancar)
description:
############## KNOWN BUGS ##############

  • Looks like I broke something with my final fixes before uploading the game... 
    So when you complete a level you  won't be able to post your result to the daily leaderboard :(
  • When restarting a randomized level a new level is generated. I will fix so that you can choose to generate a new one or retry the current level ASAP
  • The level generation does not always give nice levels. Some levels might contain floating walls and such

########################################

FUTURE PLANS

  • Fix daily leaderboard
  • Add obstacles
  • Wall jump
  • Control the player while in the air
  • Improve swing mechanic
    • Better feel
    • ...
  • Powerups
    • Speed boost
    • Double Jump
    • ...

============================

This is kind of a sequel to another game of mine (https://dancar.itch.io/swing-thing)
But it has been rewritten from the ground up and now features procedurally generated levels

HOW TO PLAY

Swing to the top and reach the goal before you are consumed by inevitable death!

Mouse: Click menu buttons

Space: Jump/Connect to points within range

Left/Right arrow keys and A/D: Spin around the connected point

R: Restart current level

M: Toggle sound

0-9: Change color palette
